postReview.title: Chelsea 1-0 Leicester City: Cucurella strike moves hosts back into top four
postReview.description: Marc Cucurella's second-half strike was enough as Chelsea beat Leicester City and moved back into the top four of the Premier League.

preReview.title: Preview: Maresca welcomes former club Leicester to Stamford Bridge

QAData.question: Who won between Chelsea and Leicester City on Sun, 09 Mar 2025 14:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Chelsea won 1–0 over Leicester City on Sun, 09 Mar 2025 14:00:00 GMT.
